column1: Uchi////I would be remiss if I didn't say a word about the service at Uchi
column2: which was excellent. Coordinating with a planner to reserve a table for 10 was quite easy
column3: and our servers were very attentive and helpful. During happy hour
column4: items are definitely a little slow to come out
column6: so order early rather than adding items as you go.
